chunk.text: Hello all my name is Krishna Aayak and welcome to my youtube channel

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)

chunk.text: Now we understand what is tokenization process

chunk.text: In my previous video we saw basic terminology of NLP

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Which is called corpus, documents, vocabulary and words

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: We call corpus as paragraph and documents as sentences

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Vocabulary as unique number of words in the dictionary and words as a specific word

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Now what is tokenization process?

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Always remember this and tokenization is very important

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: At the end of the day we take any text data in NLP

chunk.text: We will pre-process it and then we will convert it into vectors

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: For pre-processing we need to use tokenization

chunk.text: Now what is tokenization?

chunk.text: Now what is tokenization?

chunk.text: If I want to convert this paragraph into a sentence

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)
chunk.text: Then I will use sentence tokenization

chunk.title: Tutorial 3-What Is Tokenization And Its Implementation In Python_Krish Naik(1)

text: Hello all my name is Krishna Aayak and welcome to my youtube channel So guys in today's video we are going to see third tutorial of NLP which we call tokenization Now we understand what is tokenization process In my previous video we saw basic terminology of NLP Which is called corpus, documents, vocabulary and words We call corpus as paragraph and documents as sentences Vocabulary as unique number of words in the dictionary and words as a specific word Now what is tokenization process? Always remember this and tokenization is very important At the end of the day we take any text data in NLP We will pre-process it and then we will convert it into vectors For pre-processing we need to use tokenization Now what is tokenization?
